Powers.DescLong: You blend into your environment and can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense.
You are poisoned!  Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.
The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.
The Fortunata Night Widow is resistant to Psionic Damage, as well as Sleep, Hold, Immobilization and Disorient effects. They have improved Defense and Accuracy.
The poison on the blade is slowly damaging you and slowing your attacks and movement speed.
Your visual range and chance to hit have been reduced by the Smoke Grenade.
The poison on the blade is slowly damaging you and slowing your attacks and movement speed.
You are poisoned!  Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.
